newsitem.title: SYRIA: Syria sells Jordan 100,000 tonnes of black barley.
newsitem.headline: Syria sells Jordan 100,000 tonnes of black barley.

text.p: Syria's General Establishment for Cereal Processing and Trade (GECPT) has sold Jordan 100,000 tonnes of black barley, a company spokesman said on Tuesday.
He told Reuters the deal was concluded recently during talks in Damascus between the GECPT and Jordanian officials.
He did not reveal the price but traders said it was around the GECPT's price level of 138 per tonne.
The official said that 50,000 tonnes of the barley would be exported by ship from Syrian ports in the Mediterranean during April and May.
The rest would be transported by road from the GECPT's stores in the Syrian city of Daraa on the Jordanian border.
